roleset.name: remove

example.name: transitive
example.text: Researchers Wang Zhongjiang and Zhang Baoming of the Henan Academy of Social Sciences excerpted six million Chinese characters of text from New Youth magazine , which they arranged according to philosophical viewpoint , language , and intellectual trends in society .

propbank.arg: Researchers Wang Zhongjiang and Zhang Baoming of the Henan Academy of Social Sciences
six million Chinese characters of text from New Youth magazine

roleset.note: EXCERPT-V NOTES: Based on ECTB 2. No VNcls. Comparison with 'extract' and 'remove'. (from excerpt.01-v)
